name: Datascape Gate - Zhuque
text: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; shuffle 2 of your banished "Datascape" cards with different names into the Deck, then destroy that target. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Datascape" monster you control; increase or reduce its Level/Rank by 3 until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Datascape Gate - Zhuque" once per turn.
